body_html:
updated.

It seems like your do not need to re-install anaconda, find libTH* in your directory, you may find

/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCUNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCUNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1

So, it is ok to uninstall libtorch from conda, and everything goes ok

conda uninstall libtorch

Thanks for updating to the exciting 0.2.0.

body:
updated.

It seems like your do not need to re-install anaconda, find `libTH*` in your directory, you may find
```
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCUNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/libtorch-0.1.12-0/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCS.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHCUNN.so.1
/opt/anaconda/pkgs/pytorch-0.2.0-py36h04dd36b_2cu75/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1
```

So, it is ok to uninstall `libtorch` from conda, and everything goes ok
```
conda uninstall libtorch
```

Thanks for updating to the exciting `0.2.0`.
